data.message: Ultimate Glassmorphism Recipe: Combine 3 visible circles (for 3D depth) with transparent glass effect (for proper blur-through). Circles: dark top-left, red top-right, red bottom-center. Glass: #FFFFFF12 fill (7% white), 24px blur, #FFFFFF25 border, diagonal sheen gradient, subtle top haze. The visible circle edges create depth while the transparent glass lets the environment show through.
